column4: I'm trying to find some kind of a web interface for managing packages, services, and possibly more .. does anyone know of something that works well with ubuntu?
I don't know about a web interface. Synaptic works pretty well. Any particular reason you are looking for a web-only interface?
well .. its a headless server .. easier if I can do it through http ..
ah ok ... personally I prefer the command line, but yeah http would be easier indeed..
